author: Tabitha Baker
title: John Lewis online: discounts on garden furniture, TVs, freezers, exercise bikes and more
description: John Lewis has moved online and you can still bag plenty of discounts - find cheap TVs, exercise equipment, and appliances.
content:
For the first time in 155 years, John Lewis & Partners has closed its 50 stores today in its latest measures to protect against the coronavirus. That doesn't mean you can't get your hands on the goods you need to stay sane at home, however.
